last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 3
last_episode_to_air.overview: Gary Dobson and David Norris stand trial for Stephen's murder. The defence argue that potential cross contamination in the years since the murder makes forensic evidence unsafe.

name: Stephen
overview: Follows the ongoing struggle by Doreen and Neville Lawrence to achieve justice and how a detective, DCI Clive Driscoll - working closely with the Lawrences - puts together an investigation that finally - more than 18 years after his death - secures the convictions of two of the gang who committed the murder of Stephen.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Thirteen years after their son's racist murder, Stephen Lawrence's parents continue their fight for justice. Meanwhile, DCI Clive Driscoll finds Stephen's cold case files.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: DCI Driscoll tries to win the trust of the Lawrence family and key witnesses. After a forensic breakthrough, the team needs to prove the integrity of the evidence before they can make arrests.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Gary Dobson and David Norris stand trial for Stephen's murder. The defence argue that potential cross contamination in the years since the murder makes forensic evidence unsafe.
